title: 3rd Party Program bans
body:
Recently there have been a fair amount of people coming to the boards for cheat program bans.

This is more of a reminder to the regulars to not immediately assume they are guilty.

From what I've seen, we're 3 for 3 ([here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/gVmbIwkg-banned-due-to-overwolf-products), [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/WqaraAWs-account-compromised-and-now-im-banned) and [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/c69LGtLw-permanent-banned-for-no-reason) have all been unbanned) recently when it comes to people coming to the board complaining about the ban.

In all three cases their account was compromised and all had their bans reversed once they talked to Riot support (they either admitted they got it resolved or they have played games since then).

So if you see someone confused about a 3rd party ban, ask them to check their match history  and point them toward support. I don't know if there have been a recent data leak or if there's a new malware out there feeding a boosting service their accounts, but either way it's odd that there have been a lot of recent cases coming to the board about this.

Edit:
I'm going to start throwing in other cases I spot since I feel like I'm linking to this thread a lot.

4 - KRapter231 (in this thread) has had their situation resolved and resumed playing games.
5 - [Account recovered, admitted by OP.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/hGdGjUAK-account-hacked-thereafter-perma-banned)
6 - [This person even had their name changed](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/xAjkAXnZ-have-i-been-hacked-perma-banned-from-false-accusations). They have since gotten their name changed back and continued playing.
7 - [Another one](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/lUH8nd7A-wrongfully-banned-i-think-my-account-was-hacked) where the OP came back to give the news.
8 - [A lot of attention on this one](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/Mm3ZF7LB-i-got-banned-for-games-that-i-did-not-play). OP edited in "Resolved" in their post.
9 - Nyxae in this thread said they've had their issue resolved.
10 - [OP came back with the news that they got their account back.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/EP2qEOHG-permanent-ban-for-third-party-softwarei-never-used-any-of-any-kind-this-is-100-mistake) Very fast response from Riot on this.
11 - Although wasn't as quick as the last one, [OP still came back to state it was resolved.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/eKE8xQKI-what-is-wrong-with-riots-security-permabanned)
12 - [A commenter in #10 thread had their ban reversed.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/EP2qEOHG-permanent-ban-for-third-party-softwarei-never-used-any-of-any-kind-this-is-100-mistake?comment=00050000)
13 - [Came back after several years to discover they were banned.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/OieAmsJ7-permanent-ban)
14 - [Another user in #10](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/EP2qEOHG-permanent-ban-for-third-party-softwarei-never-used-any-of-any-kind-this-is-100-mistake?comment=0006). They've started playing again since their post so I assume everything got resolved.
15 - [Was a bit since I spotted another one.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/1w7QrEaw-i-got-permabanned-for-nothing) They came back and gave the update that the ban was reverted.
16 - [Another long gap between sightings.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/imn72e4y-permabanned-without-reason-or-context) OP started playing matches again since their thread.
17 - [Another No-responder](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/TWOv13QU-my-account-was-hacked-for-2-games-and-then-i-was-banned-please-help). But after a quick check at their match history they've populated it with some new games.

replies.body: It's important to remember that a "permanent" suspension is often applied in circumstances that point to an account breach to prevent further problems. Once the breach is resolved, the ban can be lifted. We do it here on the Boards, as well.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uVnmlJde,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-10-26T21:26:10.623+0000)
>
> This is more of a reminder to the regulars to not immediately assume they are guilty.

This is probably some of the best advice you can give a person on the boards.  It's one thing to view the cases with a bit of skepticism, but an entirely different, and unfair, matter to automatically assume all people are lying or trying to abuse the system.
I was banned a week ago for this and unbanned a few days later.
It looks like a banwave on hijacked accounts, in most cases the accounts have been stolen and used by scripters, as far as i can tell.

Yeah, most 3rd party program bans are done in waves so the creators of actual, malicious programs can't reverse-engineer what's getting them caught. 

 You're right about the accounts being stolen, that's usually what causes these situations.

> [{quoted}](name=Hotarµ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uVnmlJde,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-26T22:24:06.808+0000)
>
> Yeah, most 3rd party program bans are done in waves so the creators of actual, malicious programs can't reverse-engineer what's getting them caught. 
> 
>  You're right about the accounts being stolen, that's usually what causes these situations.

Sorry to join this very dead convo, but my account has also just been perma'd due to hackers logging on to my account and playing on it. Is the only thing I can do make a ticket and wait?

You're good, it's not even that old of a post :p

 Unfortunately yeah, the only option you have is to wait for a reply to that ticket. On the bright side (as mentioned in this post) most of these cases are overturned. 

While you're waiting for the ticket to be addressed, look through your match history and highlight specific games that weren't played by you. 

 Just looking at your match history I can kind of guess it was the 4 most recent games played. Your summoner spells were swapped from what they normally are and you picked up champions/roles you don't normally play. You went from playing Hecarim jungle and a lot of support/juggernauts top to Master Yi mid and fighter-Leona top. From an outsider's perspective, it's pretty obvious that your account was compromised. 

That's great news because (hopefully) Riot support will be able to resolve your situation quickly with such obvious evidence. Just be patient and explain everything calmly and thoroughly, be sure to let me know how it went. Good luck!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Yeah, I've been waiting a few hours for a response. I haven't played league since I reached gold, but I'm not sure when all these scripting games started. We'll wait and see.
How long ago did you hit gold? Just sifting through your match history for the past month I don't see anything extremely out of the ordinary.

Unrelated to KRapter231 ,but a similar thing has happened to me and i have submitted a ticket, only took 2 games and my account banned, and the games were only and hour or two away from the last time i played! I was even playing a different video game and watch a movie over discord with my GF. The biggest sign that it was not myself playing was the fact that the game with the biggest KDA difference from my normal KDA was on a Irelia, a champ i have only played ,this season, less then the amount of fingers i have on my right hand . I hope my issue can be resolved for this is my only account and one i have put a lot of work (and a decent amount of money lol) into( even if my rank does not show it LMAO).

This is so helpful. I am in the middle of a similar situation. I have no clue what the tags mean but if any of you can help in any way please let me know. My post should be near the top of this board. Seeing this gives me lots of hope though.

Yeah, not really sure why everyone is so dismissive when it comes to these cases. Scripters and geniune hackers really aren't that common.

 In my experience (and I've been using the boards for quite a bit) I'd say maybe 70 to... **80%+** of them get resolved and the owner gets their account back. It's almost always due to a false flag or from them having their account compromised.

> [{quoted}](name=Hotarµ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uVnmlJde,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-26T22:22:56.287+0000)
>

>

Didn't work for my old main :/

Almost all I could talk to were automated messages for weeks until I gave up

I just got perma banned again for no reason what so ever. I even went on the web and check my last match and it was correct. So no one has been playing my account and i have been perma banned twice in 1 month now. I literally have Steam, Microsoft Teams, and Greenshot running in my background. None of them do anything to league. This is ridiculous... Riot need to figure there **** out..

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Minax,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uVnmlJde,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2020-01-31T02:07:14.147+0000)
>
> I just got perma banned again for no reason what so ever. I even went on the web and check my last match and it was correct. So no one has been playing my account and i have been perma banned twice in 1 month now. I literally have Steam, Microsoft Teams, and Greenshot running in my background. None of them do anything to league. This is ridiculous... Riot need to figure there **** out..

If no one has played on your account then it's not really the same case as those people I pointed out in the OP. Those people were banned and unbanned because third-party programs were used while their account was compromised.

In your case, if you're getting banned for thirdparty programs and you're sure that you've been in control over your account the whole time then it's something on your end causing Riot to think your account was cheating.
Reading this gives me hope. thank you

Riot must dare try this bullshit with me.
i will ragdoll them
